LanguageData.Canis_Lupus_Crinitus.label: fluffy collie
LanguageData.Canis_Lupus_Crinitus.description: A breed of dog with wool-like white fur. Males have horns, while females don't. The fluffy collie is a very smart and quiet dog, but it is known for quickly becoming aggressive if it feels threatened.
LanguageData.Canis_Lupus_Crinitus.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Canis_Lupus_Crinitus.tools.1.label: left claws
LanguageData.Canis_Lupus_Crinitus.tools.2.label: right claws
